roleset.name: tender
roleset.note: SORE-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on Medi-tmprl1to8. Comparison to 'tender-j.01'. (from sore.01-j)

example.name: arg1
example.text: He had also had intermittent problems prior to going in for evaluation with anal pain with defecation rating a 6 on the pain scale and then he would be sore for several hours afterward .
